akn:subsection.akn:heading: Report on accountability for human rights abuses

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Report on accountability for human rights abuses Not later than 180 days after January 1, 2021, and annually thereafter for 2 years, the President shall submit a report to the appropriate congressional committees that—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Report on certain activities and finances of senior officials of the government of Sudan

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Report on certain activities and finances of senior officials of the government of Sudan Not later than 180 days after January 1, 2021, and 1 year thereafter, the President shall submit a report to the appropriate congressional committees that—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Report on sanctions pursuant to Executive Order No. 13400

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Report on sanctions pursuant to Executive Order No. 13400 Not later than 180 days after January 1, 2021, the President shall submit a report to the appropriate congressional committees that identifies the senior Sudanese government officials that President determines meet the criteria to be sanctionable pursuant to Executive Order No. 13400 (71 Fed. Reg. 25483; relating to blocking property of persons in connection with the conflict in Sudan’s Darfur region).
(d) Form The reports required under subsections (b) and (c) shall be submitted in unclassified form, but may include a classified annex.
